footer.description: PawFinder is your dedicated platform for adopting homeless pets and helping reunite lost pets with their families.

home.title: Find Your Forever Friend
home.titleDescription: Connect lost pets with their families and help animals find their forever homes.
home.foundPetsDescription: Report a lost pet and increase the chances of finding them.
home.lostPetsDescription: Report a lost pet and increase the chances of finding them.
home.adoptionDescription: Adopt a pet waiting for adoption.
home.differencesDescription: Join our community and help create happy endings for pets and their families

about.title: About Us
about.description: Welcome to PawFinder, a platform dedicated to helping both homeless animals and pets that have gone missing. You can find pets in need of a loving home, or help reunite lost pets with their families by posting information about missing or found pets, including location and contact details. Whether you're looking to adopt or to assist in reuniting a pet with its owner, together we can make a difference in their lives and provide the care and support they deserve.
about.firstCardDescription: Dogs looking for a forever home. Adopt one today!
about.secondCardDescription: Cats in need of love and care. Find your new furry friend!
